mention.text: bogota , 1 mar 90 -- colombian government minister carlos lemos
members of the marxist guerrilla group army of national liberation who have murdered the 77 followers of the left-wing party the patriotic union
president virgilio barco 's government and the military for the annihilation campaign
the military for the annihilation campaign
